lg.l: Love is always around here somewhere
Gently it's trying to blind me
Fun is sitting outside over there
Watching me from not too far away
The man inside me is dying to tell
Important things that I would never dare
My mind's considering heaven or hell
I'm looking for something nice to say
While holding you in such a special way
Why Is it hard to see the worst in me?
How will I run and hide away from me?
If the pieces could fall into place
I bet it would make you happy
I guess my silence is leaving no trace
But I will ignore you anyway
While holding you in such a special way
Why Is it hard to see the worst in me?
How will I run and hide away from me?
